title: Coast Guard suspends search for boy swept away by wave
text:
Coast Guard suspends search for boy swept away by wave 10:50am EDT - 00:49
The U.S. Coast Guard has suspended the search for a 4-year-old boy who authorities say was swept away by a wave in Kitty Hawk, North Carolina. Linda So reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
